definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And when Owl hooted , Bluebird could not sleep.
sentences.chinese: 当猫头鹰叫的时候，知更鸟睡不着。

sentences.english: The owl swooped down on a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰向一只老鼠飞扑过去。

sentences.english: The stars shone brighter than ever before, and an owl hooted in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 星星照耀得比以往更加明亮，猫头鹰在远处咕咕叫着。

sentences.english: The crows dived on the owl .
When you go owling you have to be brave.
sentences.chinese: 出来看猫头鹰一定要勇敢。

sentences.english: Cut out the fabric-covered owls and wings with scissors.
sentences.chinese: 用剪刀把已经缝上布的猫头鹰剪下来。

sentences.english: The hoot owl continued its call in the distance, and the night breeze rustled the leaves in the trees.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰在远方继续叫着，晚风吹得树叶沙沙作响。

sentences.english: Owls are nocturnal animals, which means that they sleep during the day and hunt at night.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰是夜行性动物，白天睡觉夜间猎食。

sentences.english: Bats are nocturnal animal, so do owl.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠和猫头鹰都是夜行性动物。

sentences.english: He was funny as all get-out and could talk an owl out of a tree.
sentences.chinese: 他极其有趣，一张巧嘴能把猫头鹰骗下树来。

sentences.english: The GOATSUCKER is a strange owl-like bird .
sentences.chinese: 夜鹰是种猫头鹰似的怪鸟。

sentences.english: Bowing its elbow, the owl sows in the bowl.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰弯着肘在碗中播种。

sentences.english: Cats and owls go mousing at night.
sentences.chinese: 猫和猫头鹰夜里出去捕鼠。

sentences.english: An owl forced to the gaze of an eagle.
sentences.chinese: 一只猫头鹰被迫强作雄鹰的俯瞰。

sentences.english: The owls ' formidable talons can carry birds up to the size of a chicken.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰的利爪能抓起鸡那么大小的鸟儿。

sentences.english: If an owl speak to thee, make it no answer.
sentences.chinese: 若有只猫头鹰跟你搭话，只充耳不闻。

definition: (bird species of China) barn owl (Tyto alba)
(bird species of China) Eurasian eagle-owl (Bubo bubo)
(bird species of China) Eurasian sparrowhawk (Accipiter nisus)
(bird species of China) brown hawk-owl (Ninox scutulata)
(bird species of China) long-eared owl (Asio otus)
